Verses: 1 yovaanaippaarkkilum Yesu Anegam Perai Seesharaakki Gnaanasnaanankodukkiraarendru Pariseyar Kelvippattadhaagak Karththar Arindhapodhu,
2 yoodheyaavaivittu Marubadiyum Galileyaavukkup Ponaar.
3 yesu Thaame Gnaanasnaanankodukkavillai, Avarudaiya Seeshargal Koduththaargal.
4 avar Samaariyaa Naattin Vazhiyaaip Pogavendiyadhaayirundhapadiyaal,
5 yaakkobu Than Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppukkuk Koduththa Nilaththukku Aruge Irundha Samaariyaavilulla Seekaar Ennappatta Oorukku Vandhaar.
6 ange Yaakkobudaiya Kinaru Irundhadhu; Yesu Prayaanaththinaal Ilaippadaindhavaraai Andhak Kinatrinaruge Utkaarndhaar; Appozhudhu Erakkuraiya Aaraammani Velaiyaayirundhadhu.
7 avarudaiya Seeshargal Pojanapadhaarththangalaik Kollumpadi Oorukkulle Poyirundhaargal.
8 appozhudhu Samaariyaa Naattaalaagiya Oru Sthree Thanneer Molla Vandhaal. Yesu Avalai Nokki: Thaagaththukkuththaa Endraar.

9 yoodhargal Samaariyarudane Sambandhankalavaadhavargalaanapadiyaal, Samaariya Sthree Avarai Nokki: Neer Yoodhanaayirukka, Samaariyaa Sthreeyaagiya Ennidaththil, Thaagaththukkuththaa Endru Eppadik Ketkalaam Endraal.

10 yesu Avalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Nee Dhevanudaiya Eevaiyum, Thaagaththukkuththaa Endru Unnidaththil Ketkiravar Innaar Enbadhaiyum Arindhirundhaayaanaal, Neeye Avaridaththil Kettiruppaai, Avar Unakku Jeevaththanneeraik Koduththiruppaar Endraar.
11 adharku Andha Sthree: Aandavare, Mondukolla Ummidaththil Paaththiramillaiye, Kinarum Aazhamaayirukkiradhe, Pinnai Engeyirundhu Umakku Jeevaththanneer Undaagum.
12 indhak Kinatrai Engalukkuth Thandha Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Yaakkobaip Paarkkilum Neer Periyavaro. Avarum Avar Pillaigalum Avar Mirugajeevangalum Idhile Kudiththadhunde Endraal.
13 yesu Avalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Indhath Thanneeraik Kudikkiravanukku Marupadiyum Thaagamundaagum.
14 naan Kodukkum Thanneeraik Kudikkiravanukko Orukkaalum Thaagamundaagaadhu; Naan Avanukkuk Kodukkum Thanneer Avanukkulle Niththiyajeevakaalamaai Oorugira Neerootraayirukkum Endraar.
15 andha Sthree Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Enakkuth Thaagamundaagaamalum, Naan Inge Mondukolla Varaamalumirukkumpadi Andhath Thanneerai Enakkuth Tharavendum Endraal.
16 yesu Avalai Nokki: Nee Poi, Un Purushanai Inge Azhaiththukkonduvaa Endraar.
17 adharku Andha Sthree Enakkuppurushan Illai Endraal. Yesu Avalai Nokki: Enakkup Purushan Illaiyendru Nee Sonnadhu Saridhaan.
18 eppadiyenil, Aindhu Purushar Unakkirundhaargal, Ippozhudhu Unakkirukkiravan Unakkup Purushanalla, Idhai Ullapadi Sonnaai Endraar.
19 appozhudhu Andha Sthree Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer Theerkkadharisi Endru Kaangiren.
20 engal Pidhaakkal Indha Malaiyile Thozhudhukonduvandhaargal; Neengal Erusalemilirukkira Sthalaththile Thozhudhukollavendum Engireergale Endraal.
21 adharku Yesu : Sthreeye, Naan Sollugiradhai Nambu. Neengal Indha Malaiyilum Erusalemilum Maaththiramalla, Engum Pidhaavaith Thozhudhukollunkaalam Varugiradhu.
22 neengal Ariyaadhadhaith Thozhudhukollugireergal; Naangal Arindhirukkiradhaith Thozhudhukollugirom; Enendraal Ratchippu Yoodhargal Vazhiyaai Varugiradhu.

23 unmaiyaaith Thozhudhukollugiravargal Pidhaavai Aaviyodum Unmaiyodum Thozhudhukollunkaalam Varum, Adhu Ippozhudhe Vandhirukkiradhu; Thammaith Thozhudhukollugiravargal Ippadippattavargalaayirukkumpadi Pidhaavaanavar Virumbugiraar.
24 dhevan Aavyaayirukkiraar, Avaraith Thozhudhukollugiravargal Aaviyodum Unmaiyodum Avaraith Thozhudhukollavendum Endraar.
25 andha Sthree Avarai Nokki: Kristhu Ennappadugira Mesiyaa Varugiraar Endru Ariven, Avar Varumbodhu Ellaavatraiyum Namakku Arivippaar Endraal.
26 adharku Yesu : Unnudane Pesugira Naane Avar Endraar.

27 aththarunaththil Avarudaiya Seeshargal Vandhu, Avar Sthreeyudane Pesugiradhaippatri Aachchariyappattaargal. Aagilum Enna Thedugireerendraavadhu, En Avaludane Pesugireerendraavadhu, Oruvanum Ketkavillai.
28 appozhudhu Andha Sthree, Than Kudaththai Vaiththuvittu, Oorukkullepoi, Janangalai Nokki:
29 naan Seydha Ellaavatraiyum Oru Manushan Enakku Sonnaar; Avarai Vandhu Paarungal; Avar Kristhudhaano Endraal.
30 appozhudhu Avargal Oorilirundhu Purappattu Avaridaththil Vandhaargal.
31 ippadi Nadakkaiyil Seeshargal Avarai Nokki: Rabee, Bojanampannum Endru Vendikkondaargal.
32 adharku Avar: Naan Pusippadharku Neengal Ariyaadha Oru Bojanam Enakku Undu Endraar.
33 appozhudhu Seeshargal Oruvaraiyoruvar Paarththu: Yaaraavadhu Avarukku Bojanam Konduvandhiruppaano Endraargal.
34 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Naan Ennai Anuppinavarudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seydhu Avarudaiya Kiriyaiyai Mudippadhe Ennudaiya Bojanamaayirukkiradhu.

35 aruppukkaalam Varugiradharku Innum Naalumaadham Sellum Endru Neengal Sollugiradhillaiyaa? Idho, Vayalnilangal Ippozhudhe Aruppukku Vilaindhirukkiradhendru Ungal Kangalai Ereduththuppaarungal Endru Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren.
36 vidhaikkiravanum Arukkiravanumaagiya Iruvarum Orumiththu Sandhoshappadaththakkadhaaga, Arukkiravan Kooliyai Vaangi, Niththiya Jeevanukkaagap Palanai Serththukkollugiraan.
37 vidhaikkiravan Oruvan Arukkiravan Oruvan Engira Meyyaana Vazhakkachchol Idhinaale Vilangugiradhu.
38 neengal Prayaasappattup Payiridaadhadhai Arukka Naan Ungalai Anuppinen, Matravargal Prayaasappattaargal, Avargaludaiya Prayaasaththin Palanai Neengal Petreergal Endraar.
39 naan Seydha Ellaavatraiyum Enakku Sonnaar Endru Saatchi Sonna Andha Sthreeyinudaiya Vaarththaiyinimiththam Andha Oorilulla Samaariyaril Anegar Avarmel Visuvaasamullavargalaanaargal.
40 samaariyar Avaridaththil Vandhu, Thangalidaththil Thangavendumendru Avarai Vendikkondaargal; Avar Irandunaal Ange Thanginaar.
41 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Ubadhesaththinimiththam Innum Anegamper Visuvaasiththu,
42 andha Sthreeyai Nokki: Un Sollinimiththam Alla, Avarudaiya Ubadhesaththai Naangale Kettu, Avar Meyyaaik Kristhuvaagiya Ulagaratchagar Endru Arindhu Visuvaasikkirom Endraargal.
43 irandunaalaikkuppinbu Avar Avvidamvittup Purappattu, Galileyaavukkup Ponaar.
44 oru Theerkkadharisikkuth Than Sondha Oorile Ganamillaiyendru Yesu Thaame Solliyirundhaar.
45 avar Galileyaavil Vandhapodhu, Erusalemil Pandigaiyile Avar Seydha Ellaavatraiyum Paarththirundha Galileyar Avarai Etrukkondaargal. Avargalum Pandigaikkup Poyirundhaargal.

46 pinbu, Yesu Thaam Thanneeraith Thraatcharasamaakkina Galileyaavilulla Kaanaa Oorukku Marupadiyum Vandhaar; Appozhudhu Kapparnakoomile Raajaavin Manusharil Oruvanudaiya Kumaaran Vyaadhiyaayirundhaan.

47 yesu Yoodheyaavilirundhu Galileyaavukku Vandhaarendru Andha Manushan Kelvippattapodhu, Avaridaththirkup Poi, Than Magan Marana Avasthaiyaayirundhapadiyinaale, Avanaik Gunamaakkumpadikku Varavendumendru Avarai Vendikkondaan.
48 appozhudhu Yesu Avanai Nokki: Neengal Adaiyaalangalaiyum Arpudhangalaiyum Kaanaavittaal Visuvaasikkamaatteergal Endraar.
49 adharku Raajaavin Manushan: Aandavare, En Pillai Saagiradharkumunne Varavendum Endraan.
50 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Pogalaam, Un Kumaaran Pizhaiththirukkiraan Endraar. Andha Manushan, Yesu Sonna Vaarththaiyai Nambip Ponaan.
51 avan Pogaiyil, Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Avanukku Edhirkonduvandhu, Ummudaiya Kumaaran Pizhaiththirukkiraan Endru Ariviththaargal.
52 appozhudhu: Endha Manineraththil Avanukku Gunamundaayitru Endru Avargalidaththil Visaariththaan. Avargal: Netru Ezhaamanineraththil Juram Avanai Vittadhu Endraargal.
53 un Kumaaran Pizhaiththirukkiraan Endru Yesu Thannudane Sonna Manineram Adhuve Endru Thagappan Arindhu, Avanum Avan Veettaaranaivarum Visuvaasiththaargal.
54 yesu Yoodheyaavilirundhu Galileyaavukkuth Thirumbivandhapinbu, Idhu Avar Seydha Irandaam Arpudham.
